content:
The provided document is a comprehensive guide for developers working with Panda3D, an open-source 3D engine. The manual is divided into key sections covering various aspects of using the engine, from basic programming concepts and asset management to advanced performance optimization and distribution techniques.

pipeline/index

Debugging

This section documents the various methods that can be employed in order to find problems in a Panda3D program.

debugging/index

Performance Optimization

Performance optimization is often a necessary step in the production of a 3D game in order to make the game work on as broad a range of computer hardware as possible. This section explains how to find and fix performance issues using the powerful performance analysis tools that Panda3D offers.

optimization/index

Distribution

This section explains how to compile a completed Panda3D application into an executable file and package it up for distribution.

distribution/index

API Reference

This section contains a complete listing of all the classes and functions that are a part of the Panda3D API.

reference/index

More Resources
